listitem.para: Added additional support for Oracle databases.
Added in support for accessing XML files and querying via SQLite driver
Added support to project file to support parallelized builds
Added support for a rectangle primitive to writer/renderer
Added support for print preview functionality
Added additional support for language translations, French included
Added "Word Wrap" option to Field entity
Added in better support for Custom Page sizes when rendering reports
Fixed a problem where database arguments were not passed correctly to API
Fixed include path in project file to compile on windows correctly
Removed some Qt3 Backwards compatibility classes
Fixed code to find correct window when using top-level windows
Fixed Linux bug where print-range was being corrupted
Fixed render bug where reports were queries were being executed several times
Fixed a problem where an error occurred if a report was not loaded from the database
